description: Scarlets, Ospreys, Cardiff and Dragons fans can find all the latest news about Welsh rugby's four professional regions here.
title: Welsh regions: Dragons, Scarlets, Ospreys & Cardiff news
title_page: Welsh regions: Dragons, Scarlets, Ospreys & Cardiff news - BBC Sport
maintext:
Want to read all the news about the Welsh region you support?
You can do that here:
Cardiff news, features and videos.
Dragons news, features and videos.
Ospreys news, features and videos.
Scarlets news, features and videos.
You can also follow Scrum V on X (formerly Twitter), external for all the latest Welsh rugby news, which you can also find on the BBC Sport website and app.
In addition all the Scrum V Podcasts are available here and you can watch Scrum V highlights and Scrum V The Warm Up on demand via iPlayer.
